title: When Comes Darkness
description: Paul Day has written many Gothic and dark tales in the form of verse. This book represents a selection of his best and darkest poems, exploring the inner most workings of the human soul in all its wonder, terror and mystery. When comes the darkness, no man, woman, spirit or beast can understand the depths of horror, the torment of the soul and the anguish of the human spirit. Come on a journey of discovery and see if you don't see something familiar, reflected in your own soul, within the pages of this book.
author: Paul G. Day
